daily.text: If you want to leave your footprints on the sands of time, be sure you’re wearing work shoes.
daily.author: Unknown

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: If you have few days to live your life, what will be your passion for last days?
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: You promote yourself every time you take on a new responsibility.
daily.author: William Gore

daily.text: Make a plan that concern your purpose, your calling and describes exactly what should be done every day for your purpose and life mission.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: The more expansive government is, the more perils people face in daily lives, be it from IRS agents or from child support services, or from other agencies that often have little or no legal restraints on their power.
daily.author: James Bovard

daily.text: We should concentrate our work not only to a separated housing problem but housing involved in our daily work and all the other functions of the city.
daily.author: Alvar Aalto

daily.text: So many of us are causing pain and suffering to ourselves on daily basis, because we do not know the value of life.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: What parent can give to their children is the gift of daily prayer.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The gift of the moments and its lessons prepares us for a better tomorrow.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: May you find the right path to your destination.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: Circumvent negative influences, circumstances and people.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: They're still advertising the added health-giving advantages of vitamins in your daily diet, although it has long since been shown that you'd be better off eating Smarties.
daily.author: Terry Wogan

daily.text: If we don’t live in the same vibe, it is hard to be aware of each other. When our reading differs from our neighbors’ reality, our surroundings may take a range of discordant shades and daily episodes become unrecognizable. But if we endeavor to find out, the “who is who”, the “what is what” and the “where is Waldo”, we might demonstrate our social literacy and connectedness. ('Fish for silence.').
daily.author: Erik Pevernagie

daily.text: There are problems and there are problems. One big problem and a great paradox in the arena of life is the problem of where or how a person is now and where or how he wants to be tomorrow. Had it not been this problem, we would have been relaxing all day long.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: Divide the big task into small pieces which can be done every day.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Our daily prayer ought to be: Please universe, help me help myself and help me show others how to help themselves.
daily.author: Kamand Kojouri

daily.text: We designed a car that is for daily commutes and that you charge every day. The less you use the gasoline engine, the better mpg. Essentially, the Karma can achieve dramatic savings and low CO2 output when used as intended, as a daily commuter.
daily.author: Henrik Fisker

daily.text: The essence of life is finding something you really love and then making the daily experience worthwhile.
daily.author: Denis Waitley

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wanderlust.text: I was running and deliberately lost my way. The world far off and nothing but my breath and the very next step and it’s like hypnosis. The feeling of conquering my own aliveness with no task but to keep going, making every way the right away and that’s a metaphor for everything.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: There's more to a person than flesh. Judge others by the sum of their soul and you'll see that beauty is a force of light that radiates from the inside out.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: I get butterflies every time I wander beautiful places I've never been.
wanderlust.author: Katrice Cabral

wanderlust.text: ...But I preferred reading the American landscape as we went along. Every bump, rise, and stretch in it mystified my longing.
wanderlust.author: Jack Kerouac

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: The best traveler is one without a camera.
wanderlust.author: Kamand Kojouri

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: When no possessions keep us, when no countries contain us, and no time detains us, man becomes a heroic wanderer, and woman, a wanderess.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: I built my home in the feeling of waking up at dawn in a new city, where every road is the right road because there is no ordinary. Everything is as profound as you make it.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: There is no such thing as loving a child too much.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: She is like a butterfly, Beautiful to look at But hard to catch.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: It was a place as blank as a sheet of paper. It was the place I had always been looking for... Flat expanses would call to me... These are the places where the desert is most itself: stark, open, free, an invitation to wander, a laboratory of perception, scale, light, a place where loneliness has a luxurious flavor...
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: Through all his years of roving, even on nights like this, he had remained blind to the beauty of the sea, and now his feeling toward it had settled into weary hatred. He knew its effects of blended color, its wide gradations of sound and action, the tireless charm of a sailing ship's effortless movement, the quality of silent distance and the wonder of the skies. Dimly at times, in moments of rare emotion, he had caught a glimpse of the mystic hand that beckons beyond the horizon and felt for a little while the fated urge of the wanderer. But that was in the beginning, long ago when he had first gone to sea, and he had forgotten it.('Fire In The Galley Stove').
wanderlust.author: William Outerson

wanderlust.text: I was forced to wander, having no one, forced by my nature to keep wandering because wandering was the only thing that I believed in, and the only thing that believed in me.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: To belong nowhere is a blessing and a curse, like any kind of freedom.
wanderlust.author: Leah Stewart

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: You don't even know where I'm going.'I don't care. I'd like to go anywhere.
wanderlust.author: John Steinbeck

wanderlust.text: I love to sail forbidden seas and land on barbarous coasts.
wanderlust.author: Herman Melville

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: It's in those quiet little towns, at the edge of the world, that you will find the salt of the earth people who make you feel right at home.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: I love going out of my way, beyond what I know, and finding my way back a few extra miles, by another trail, with a compass that argues with the map…nights alone in motels in remote western towns where I know no one and no one I know knows where I am, nights with strange paintings and floral spreads and cable television that furnish a reprieve from my own biography, when in Benjamin’s terms, I have lost myself though I know where I am. Moments when I say to myself as feet or car clear a crest or round a bend, I have never seen this place before. Times when some architectural detail on vista that has escaped me these many years says to me that I never did know where I was, even when I was home.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: I was lieing to myself when I thought I was lost, I have never been lost - I just wasn't ready to be found.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: When a Wanderess has been caged, or perched with her wings clipped, She lives like a Stoic, She lives most heroic, smiling with ruby, moistened lips once her cup of Death is welcome sipped.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: Fantasy like thought that no man could rainJust let her reignRun wild with her unafraidOf any rain stormsThey only wash the mud away and make wayFor double rainbows and sunny days.
wanderlust.author: Maquita Donyel Irvin

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: Stop changing yourself for the sake of other people. You shouldn't care what strangers think and true friends won't ask you to change.
motivational.author: Avina Celeste

motivational.text: In this beautiful world anything is Possible, but only when we Believe wholeheartedly and try!
motivational.author: Mohith Agadi

motivational.text: Taking the decision-making process away from people disempowers them. It also makes them much less likely to buy into the decision, however right it may be. One’s own conscience remains the ultimate arbiter.
motivational.author: Lama Surya Das

motivational.text: You can'tstop dreamingjust becausethe night neverseems toend.
motivational.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

motivational.text: Stop spending your energy on thoughts you don't want and things you don't need. Spend your energy on the thoughts, people, things and dreams you do want. You only have so much energy in the day; spend it wisely.
motivational.author: Avina Celeste

motivational.text: Stars earn their brightest colors in the dark.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: Forgiving yourself, believing in yourself and choosing to love yourself are the best gifts one could receive.
motivational.author: Brittany Burgunder

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: Who said I won't fail? I might. Who said I might give up? I won't.
motivational.author: Vikrmn

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: If she says goodbye, someone else will say hi.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: Its not about reaching a Peak but to develop an attitude of discovering new Peaks in Life!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: Let someone else be the most powerful country, make ours the most peaceful country.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: GOD is like a streetlight. He keeps observing you silently when it is light and showers you with light when you are in darkness!
motivational.author: Uma Shanker

motivational.text: If you want to get the best out of people, ask them for help rather than assigning them work.
motivational.author: Jag Randhawa

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: It's okay to be nervous, scared, angry or sad sometimes so long as you don't let those emotions rule your entire life.
motivational.author: Avina Celeste

motivational.text: Awake! Arise! The hour is late! Angels are knocking at thy door!They are in haste and cannot wait, And once departed come no more.Awake! Arise! The athlete's arm Loses its strength by too much rest;The fallow land, the untilled farm Produces only weeds at best.
motivational.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

motivational.text: We have to do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

love.text: Dads. Do your faces light up when you first see your child in the morning or when you come home from work? Do you not understand that a child’s entire sense of value can revolve around what they see in your face when you first see them?
love.author: Dan Pearce

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: Learn to let urgency go. Nothing is urgent. Stress is the product of uncertainty and urgency of life.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: That of all people, it should be him; that took her aback. That the heart should settle on somebody like him; that surprised her. But she was so certain about it, so certain.
love.author: Alexander McCall Smith

love.text: Until you let go of that bitterness in your heart, it will find a comfortable place to destroy your dreams, your sight and most times, your sleep.
love.author: Israelmore Ayivor

love.text: The trick when it comes to dealing with depression is being able to imagine yourself out of it. When you can picture a happier life, you will be determined to work at the things that prevent it from happening.
love.author: Keysha Jade

love.text: Love encompasses so much, reaches so far, and heals so deeply, that any attempt to describe it, no matter how poetic, only dilutes it.
love.author: Steve Maraboli

love.text: And among many understandings and misunderstandings, Lany and Antony once again were victims of an illusory love...
love.author: Pet Torres

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

love.text: On the seventh day of the Seventh-month, in the Palace of Long Life,We told each other secretly in the quiet midnight worldThat we wished to fly in heaven, two birds with the wings of one,And to grow together on the earth, two branches of one tree.'Earth endures, heaven endures; some time both shall end,While this unending sorrow goes on and on for ever.
love.author: Bai Juyi

love.text: Photographs are very interesting, and you can look into them a million times and still find a new meaning in them, something in the past that was caught in the film itself….
love.author: Rebecca McNutt

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: Courage is a warrior, wisdom is a sage, virtue is a priest, and love is poet.
love.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

love.text: Why be alone when we can be together babyYou can make my life worthwhileAnd I can make you start to smile.
love.author: Mr. Big

love.text: We swam deep in the waves, a wild chase ..Stained with memories and pain.Who knew a gulf would lay between?Who knew loving someone, would ache?
love.author: honeste_

love.text: I am falling in love with heavenly Father.
love.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: The truth is a community is as big or as small as your heart lets it be.
love.author: Genevieve Dewey

love.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: Every soul is beautiful and precious; is worthy of dignity and respect, and deserving of peace, joy and love.
love.author: Bryant McGill

love.text: You’ve got the best of me.
love.author: Sami Abouzid

love.text: I have never seen as far, than those times I have looked through someone else's perspective.
love.author: Tonny K. Brown

love.text: It’s normal to like guys who seem to like you; it’s normal to want to be loved.”Kami raised her eyebrows. “I’m sixteen,” she said. “I’m not looking for love.”“Oh,” said Liz. “Uh, what are you looking for?”“Cheap thrills, mostly,” said Kami.
love.author: Sarah Rees Brennan

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: If only you could be yourself.' they shouted. So, she did. 'You are not like me or anyone I have met!' they screamed. So, she blended. 'You are so fake.' they laughed. So, the caterpillar retreated to her cocoon to find peace alone. One day, they came to find her gone. She left a message, “God knew I was different and gave me these beautiful wings because he meant for me to fly. You see...I wasn’t meant to be like you. I was meant to be me--better.
love.author: Shannon L. Alder

happiness.text: We fear no one knows our potential, ability, power, and talent. We fear to learn about our capability and capacity so we keep it latent.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Love is fuel for the soul.
happiness.author: Molly Friedenfeld

happiness.text: Within sadness lives a happiness deeper than any pain.
happiness.author: Cathryn Alpert

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: The best thing you can do for yourself if you wish to see your dreams become reality is to find success and replicate it.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: Those who have assets must withdraw them from the markets of loans. Do not accept notes of loan on speculation. The time will soon come when you will gain no profits from the market of loans, and your wealth will be taken by the very few.
happiness.author: Compton Gage

happiness.text: With mercy and sympathy, no one will hate to love one another.
happiness.author: Auliq Ice

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: .Be happy now, not when..
happiness.author: Boris Kovalík

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: When my mother didn't come back I realized that any moment could be the last. Nothing in life should simply be a passage from one place to another. Each walk should be taken as if it is the only thing you have left. You can demand something like this of yourself as an unattainable ideal. After that, you have to remind yourself about it every time you're sloppy about something. For me that means 250 times a day.
happiness.author: Peter Høeg

happiness.text: Sorcha took the elevator down to the basement of the fashion house. She glanced at her stunningly beautiful reflection in the mirror and smiled to herself. How fortunate she was to be a vampire - no gray hairs, no wrinkles, no broken nails, no weight problems, and no PMT. What bliss! And how fortunate it was that all the legends about vampires were not true. She could not imagine an existence where she could not see and admire her own likeness - such a life to her would be intolerable and tedious. How could any female, even a vampire, survive without being able to see their own reflection? How could they do their hair and makeup? The very idea was totally preposterous.
happiness.author: Alan Kinross

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Joy came always after pain.
happiness.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

happiness.text: Five minutes after something happened might not be the best time for you to get into your Facebook and tell everybody. Men's panic does not produce God's power.
happiness.author: Patience Johnson

happiness.text: Seeking external validation brings disappointment. Validate yourself from within to find true happiness.
happiness.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Happiness is not always a reality many times it is in our memory.
happiness.author: Hockson Floin

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: Sometimes I get so sad that it jest sounds good.
happiness.author: Abbi Glines

happiness.text: Most people are about as happy as their self confidence will allow them to be.
happiness.author: Shannon L. Alder

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: Men are made for happiness  and anyone who is completely happy has a right to say to himself: 'I am doing God's will on earth.'.
happiness.author: Anton Chekhov

happiness.text: No one is to blame because there is no one other than you. Nothing is to disrespect because there is nothing other than you.
happiness.author: Amit Ray

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: Scars are the awards of success, not the medals.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: An ounce of joy is the equivalent of a ton of happiness.
happiness.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

positive.text: Circumvent negative influences, circumstances and people.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Doubt breeds doubt.
positive.author: Franz Grillparzer

positive.text: Where the world only sees a seed, an optimist sees a tree.
positive.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

positive.text: When the brain thinks positively, the hands work positively, the legs run positively and the individual becomes a positive wholesome entity.
positive.author: Israelmore Ayivor

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: Accept advice from others and be sure they are positive before you set of to execute them.
positive.author: Israelmore Ayivor

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The reality is that changes are coming. ... They must come. You must share in bringing them.
positive.author: John Hersey

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: Blessed is the person who desired to read the Holy Scriptures. It’s brings great reward to those who believe, trust and obey the Holy instructions.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: You live not only for yourself but for others.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Fear robs you of your freedom to make the right choice in life that can bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be. On the other side of fear, lies freedom. If you want to grow, you need to be brave and take risks. If you're not uncomfortable, you're not growing.
positive.author: Roy T. Bennett

positive.text: A positive attitude is most easily arrived at through a deliberate and rational analysis of what’s required to manifest unwavering positive thought patterns. First, reflect on the actual, present condition of your mind. In other words, is the mind positive or not? We’ve all met individuals who perceive themselves as positive people but don’t appear as such. Since the mind is both invisible and intangible, it’s therefore easier to see the accurate characteristics of the mind through a person’s words, deeds, and posture.For example, if we say, “It’s absolutely freezing today! I’ll probably catch a cold before the end of the day!” then our words expose a negative attitude. But if we say, “The temperature is very cold” (a simple statement of fact), then our expressions, and therefore attitude, are not negative. Sustaining an alert state in which self-awareness becomes possible gives us a chance to discover the origins of negativity. In doing so, we also have an opportunity to arrive at a state of positiveness, so that our words and deeds are also positive, making others feel comfortable, cheerful, and inspired.
positive.author: H.E. Davey

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The mightiest flame of fire lies positive mindset.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Change of heart comes from the Creator.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Theres a remarkable amount of strength residing in those who move forward without being able to physically move. Ones that carry the weight of illness or a disability, they battle wars most know nothing about. They are the true warriors of the world, the ones who have every reason to quit but never do.
positive.author: Nikki Rowe

positive.text: Encouragement is the strength of the soul.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: I expect some new phases of life this summer  and shall try to get the honey from each moment.
positive.author: Lucy Stone

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
positive.author: Tiger Woods

positive.text: Any path is only a path  and there is no affront  to oneself or to others  in dropping it if that is what your heart tells you.
positive.author: Carlos Castaneda

positive.text: He who cannot change the very fabric of his thought will never be able to change reality.
positive.author: Anwar Sadat

positive.text: Live every day in the full expression of God’s grace in this coming year.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Instead of being frustrated by adversity, our mind focuses on the adventure of creativity with our thoughts. What a glorious paradise?
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: How can the face that welcomed me into the world be the face I'll soon forget? How can the body I came through be the body I don't really know?
strength.author: Michelle Carithers

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: We fall many times. But we find strength within to rise again.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: Be thankful to those who refuse to help you, for they force you to summon upon your warrior within.
strength.author: Miya Yamanouchi

strength.text: The strongest backs bear the heaviest burdens.
strength.author: Will Bly

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Never complain, pray for strength to overcome the difficulty.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: A father gives his child nothing better than a good education.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Elena glanced up at him, taking in his words. “If you get rid of your fear? You know, I never look at you as someone who’s afraid.”“That’s because every time you look at me, I’m looking right back, and the only time I’m not afraid, is when I see you. And I do see you, Elena. I see everything you’ve been through, from so young – how you struggled through it; how you never let it destroy your hope and faith – and I’m afraid of nothing.'(Karl and Elena).
strength.author: Dianna Hardy

strength.text: When it all comes together, it is oddly beautiful and it makes sense.
strength.author: Greg Dutilly

strength.text: Your strength is beyond your own imagination.
strength.author: Bryant McGill

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: You cannot become the greatest without at least a gr- and a test inside of you.
strength.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

strength.text: An abundant life is one where we are physically strong, mentally sound, and spiritually aflame. I.
strength.author: Toni Sorenson

strength.text: She can feel his blood, just beneath his skin; when he breathes, the air fills with smoke. He's like a dragon, ancient and fearless.
strength.author: Alice Hoffman

strength.text: WISDOM is the STRONGEST weapon you could EVER acquire in your LIFETIME.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Her fatigue was gone; she felt vital and strong, like a tree coming back to life in the springtime, vibrant with sap, ready to put out buds and then blossoms.
strength.author: Linda Lael Miller

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Its hardness and solidity had been an odd kind of comfort. Do not wish for anything. Be and endure. The Old African had learned that enduring was power too, and just as he had been drawn to the boulder, so the slaves, after a while, were drawn to him.
strength.author: Julius Lester

strength.text: The strength of will is the grace of survival.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: To cherish my purity and set boundaries are, in my opinion, the highest forms of feminism—a woman who saves her body proves she is strong and secure enough to resist the men who seek to claim her, that she’s more than what lies between her legs.
strength.author: Caroline George

strength.text: Achieving your goals depends more on the way you manage to push through the bad days, than shine on the good ones.
strength.author: Lorri Faye

strength.text: Would he ever have the strength to stop looking?
strength.author: J.K. Rowling

strength.text: Rise in mighty strength and live your dream.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami
